```{r}
library(epidemia)
plot.death <- function(time.start , time.end) {
  data.time <- filter(data, date < as.Date(time.end))
  data <- filter(data.time, date > as.Date(time.start))
  # reproduction number
  rt <- epirt(
    formula = R(Nation, date) ~ 1 + 
      schools_universities + Legislation + Lockdown,
    prior = shifted_gamma(
      shape=1/6, scale = 1, shift = log(1.05)/6
    ),
    prior_covariance = decov(
      shape = c(2, rep(0.5, 5)),scale=0.25
    ),
    link = scaled_logit(5.7)
  )
  # the infection model 
  inf <- epiinf(
    gen = EuropeCovid2$si, 
    seed_days = 6L,
    pop_adjust = TRUE, pops = pop #population
  )
  # the death case
  deaths <- epiobs(
    formula = deaths ~ 1,
    i2o = EuropeCovid2$inf2death, 
    prior_intercept = normal(0, 0.5),
    link = scaled_logit(0.05)
  )

  args <- list(
    rt=rt, inf=inf, obs=deaths, 
    data=data, seed=12345, refresh=0
  )
  options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())

  pr_args <- c(
    args, 
    list(
      algorithm="sampling", iter=1e3, 
      prior_PD=TRUE, control = list(adapt_delta = 0.99)
      )
    )
  fm_prior <- do.call(epim, pr_args)

  p1 <- plot_rt(fm_prior, levels = c(30, 50, 95))
  args$algorithm <- "fullrank"
  args$iter <- 5000
  args$tol_rel_obj <- 1e-5
  fm <- do.call(epim, args)
  p2 <- plot_rt(
    fm, step = T, levels = c(10, 30, 95)
    )
  p3 <- plot_obs(
    fm, type = "deaths", step = T, levels = c(10, 30, 95)
    )
  p4 <- plot_infections(
    fm, levels = c(30, 50, 95), step = T
    )
  p5 <- cowplot::plot_grid(
    p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow = 2, labels = LETTERS[1:4]
    )
  return(list(prior = p1, rt = p2, obs = p3, infection = p4, overall = p5))
}
```


```{r}
library(epidemia)
data.bed <- data
data.bed$index <- 1:nrow(data)
coef <- lm(Beds ~ index, data.bed[89:105,])$coefficients
for (i in 1:89) {
  b <- round(
    as.numeric(coef[1]) + as.numeric(coef[2]) * data.bed$index[i]
    )
  if (b > 0){
    data.bed$Beds[i] <- b
  }
}

plot.beds <- function(time.start , time.end, data) {
  data <- filter(data, date < as.Date(time.end))
  data <- filter(data, date > as.Date(time.start))
  # reproduction number
  rt <- epirt(
    formula = R(Nation, date) ~ 1  +
      schools_universities + Legislation + Lockdown,
    prior = shifted_gamma(
      shape = 1/6, scale = 1, shift = log(1.05)/6),
    prior_covariance = decov(
      shape = c(2, rep(0.5, 5)), scale = 0.25),
    link = scaled_logit(5.7)
    )
    
  # the infection model 
  inf <- epiinf(
    gen = EuropeCovid2$si, 
    seed_days = 6L,
    pop_adjust = TRUE, pops = pop #population
  )
  # the hospital case
  Beds <- epiobs(
    formula = Beds ~ 1 + inhospital,
    i2o = dlnorm(1:20, 1.921, 0.418), #https://www.acpjournals.org/doi/full/10.7326/M20-0504
    link = scaled_logit(0.138),
    prior_intercept = normal(0, 0.2)
  )

  args <- list(
    rt=rt, inf=inf, obs=Beds, 
    data=data, seed=12345, refresh=0
  )
  options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())

  pr_args <- c(
    args, 
    list(
      algorithm="sampling", iter=1e3, 
      prior_PD=TRUE, control = list(adapt_delta = 0.999)
      )
    )
  fm_prior <- do.call(epim, pr_args)

  p1 <- plot_rt(fm_prior, levels = c(30, 60, 95))
  args$algorithm <- "fullrank"
  args$iter <- 1e4
  args$tol_rel_obj <- 1e-8
  fm <- do.call(epim, args)
  p2 <- plot_rt(
    fm, step = T, levels = c(30, 60, 95)
    )
  p3 <- plot_obs(
    fm, type = "Beds", step = T, levels = c(30, 60, 95)
    )
  p4 <- plot_infections(
    fm, levels = c(30, 60, 95), step = T
    )
  p5 <- cowplot::plot_grid(
    p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow = 2, labels = LETTERS[1:4]
    )
  return(list(prior = p1, rt = p2, obs = p3, infection = p4, overall = p5))
}
```
